lead_paragraph: Schools closed during the Ebola crisis began reopening Monday, but many parents were still too afraid to send their children to classes.
snippet: Schools closed during the Ebola crisis began reopening Monday, but many parents were still too afraid to send their children to classes.

headline.main: Guinea: Schools Reopen as Ebola Ebbs
headline.print_headline: Guinea: Schools Reopen as Ebola Ebbs
